userExpressions.expression: rsc != null && rsc.contains('/') ? keepAfterLast(rsc, '/') : '' AS rscId
rsc != null && rsc.contains(':') && rsc.indexOf('/') > rsc.lastIndexOf(':') ? keepBefore(keepAfterLast(rsc, ':'), '/') : '' AS rscType

emailNotification.name: Email Notification id=621
emailNotification.body-first: Resource is ${coalesce([tags.message.detail.state, tags.message.detail.result])}: ${rsc} ${addLink('View in AWS Console', 'https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=' + region + '#' + rscType + 's:search=' + rscId)}
emailNotification.body-repeat: Resource is ${coalesce([tags.message.detail.state, tags.message.detail.result])}: ${rsc} ${addLink('View in AWS Console', 'https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=' + region + '#' + rscType + 's:search=' + rscId)}
emailNotification.body-cancel: Resource is ${coalesce([tags.message.detail.state, tags.message.detail.result])}: ${rsc} ${addLink('View in AWS Console', 'https://console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region=' + region + '#' + rscType + 's:search=' + rscId)}
